title: Research: Calling convention (eval/apply vs push/enter vs CPS)
body:
Research and decide on calling convention for compiled Haskell functions. Candidates: eval/apply (GHC default), push/enter (Marlow & Peyton Jones), CPS. Must work with GRIN's explicit thunk representation and LLVM backend.

**References**: Marlow & Peyton Jones, "Making a Fast Curry" (2004)
